awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A group of dated appliances that find themselves stranded in a summer home that their family had just sold, decide to, è la "The Incredible Journey", seek their young 8 year old "master". Children's film which on the surface is a frivolous fantasy, but with a dark subtext of abandonment, obsolescence, and loneliness.
plot: A toaster, a blanket, a lamp, a radio, and a vacuum cleaner journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in their cabin in the woods.
title: The Brave Little Toaster
